Title: Conforms the definition of an incarcerated individual with a serious mental illness to the definition of "person with a serious mental illness" in the mental hygiene law
Summary: Conforms the definition of an incarcerated individual with a serious mental illness to the definition of "person with a serious mental illness" in the mental hygiene law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to incarcerated individuals with a serious mental illness
